name: Worm Protect Egg
description:
WORM PROTECT EGG

Play as a worm, protect your egg.

Enemies that collide with your tail will be stunned, eat them to increase your length.

New segments for your tail can be dropped with Z, these will block enemies too!

The longer the tail, the slower you move.

Eat lots of enemies in a row to rack up a combo and get more points!

Made for Ludum Dare 46 (April 2020)
